akn:section.akn:heading: Improved aircraft, aircraft engines, propellers, and appliances

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration may conduct or supervise developmental work and service testing to improve aircraft, aircraft engines, propellers, and appliances.
(b) The Administrator shall conduct or supervise research—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Authority To Buy Items Offering Special Advantages.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) In carrying out this section, the Administrator, by negotiation or otherwise, may buy or exchange experimental aircraft, aircraft engines, propellers, and appliances that the Administrator decides may offer special advantages to aeronautics.
